data.title: Lower Mid Vent To Front Mid Bottom Recon Bolt
data.description: This is useful for scanning players in the Mid Bottom Cubby, and some of Mid Top from Lower Mid Vent.

data.title: Mid Vent To Left Side Mid Bottom Shock Bolt
data.description: This simple shock bolt lineup is useful for doing chip damage to players in the left Mid Bottom corner, which can make defending Mid a bit easier, as well as do damage that leads to easier kills later in the round when retaking or defending one of the Sites.

data.title: A Tower To A Main Recon Bolt
data.description: This is useful for revealing players in A Lobby, as well as part of A Main, and should maybe be used alongside other similar recon bolts into A Lobby throughout a match so that players have a harder time predicting where it will land. To do this, hug the wall behind you, and follow the lineup on-screen.
